trans-unit.source: Represents controls that expose their dock properties within a docking container.
trans-unit.target: Representa controles que exponen sus propiedades de acoplamiento dentro de un contenedor de acoplamiento.

trans-unit.source: A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: Un contenedor de acoplamiento es un control que permite la disposición de los secundarios elementos, tanto horizontal como verticalmente, con respecto a los límites del contenedor de acoplamiento y otros elementos dentro del contenedor.

trans-unit.source: Controls are docked relative to each other based on their current z-order; the higher their z-order placement, the further they are placed from the specified edge of the docking container.
trans-unit.target: Los controles se acoplan con relación a entre sí basándose en su orden z actual; el mayor su posición de orden z, cuanto más se colocan del borde especificado del contenedor de acoplamiento.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Vea [asignación de patrones de Control para clientes de UI Automation](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) para obtener ejemplos de controles que pueden implementar este patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> does not support any properties of the docking container or any properties of controls that might be docked adjacent to the current control within the docking container.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> no admite las propiedades del contenedor de acoplamiento ni propiedades de controles que puedan estar acoplados adyacentes al control actual dentro del contenedor de acoplamiento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los valores de la propiedad [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] almacenados en caché para esta clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Estructura que contiene los valores de propiedades de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] almacenados en caché para el patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Valores de propiedad almacenados en caché deben debieron solicitarse previamente mediante un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> para obtener el valor actual de una propiedad.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre las propiedades disponibles y su uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: La propiedad solicitada no está en la memoria caché.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene los valores de propiedad actuales de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Estructura que contiene los valores actuales de la propiedad [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] para el patrón de control.

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: Este modelo debe ser de un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> con un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.Full> referencia con el fin de obtener los valores actuales.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> se obtuvo mediante <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode.None>, contiene solo datos almacenados en caché, y si se intenta obtener el valor actual de cualquier propiedad produce una excepción.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> para obtener el valor almacenado en caché de una propiedad que se especificó anteriormente mediante un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre las propiedades disponibles y su uso, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.DockPatternInformation.DockPosition" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador se usa por aplicaciones cliente de automatización de interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Proveedores de automatización de interfaz de usuario deben usar el campo equivalente en <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: This property can also be retrieved from the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Esta propiedad también se puede recuperar desde el <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Current%2A> o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern.Cached%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition.None>.
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado es <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition.None>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition> value is obtained representing the current dock position for a control that supports <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition> se obtiene valor que representa la posición de acoplamiento actual para un control que admite <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" /> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Identifica el patrón de control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Este identificador se usa por aplicaciones cliente de automatización de interfaz de usuario.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Proveedores de automatización de interfaz de usuario deben usar el campo equivalente en <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: The pattern [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: El patrón de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id](~/includes/tlasharptla-id-md.md)] se pasan a métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> para recuperar el patrón de control de interés de los especificados <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.DockPattern> se obtiene el patrón de control de un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: The dock position relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: La posición de acoplamiento con respecto a los límites del contenedor de acoplamiento y otros elementos dentro del contenedor.

trans-unit.source: Docks the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> at the requested <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition" /> within a docking container.
trans-unit.target: Acopla el <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> en la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.DockPosition" /> solicitada dentro de un contenedor de acoplamiento.

trans-unit.source: A docking container is a control that allows the arrangement of child elements, both horizontally and vertically, relative to the boundaries of the docking container and other elements within the container.
trans-unit.target: Un contenedor de acoplamiento es un control que permite la disposición de los secundarios elementos, tanto horizontal como verticalmente, con respecto a los límites del contenedor de acoplamiento y otros elementos dentro del contenedor.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> representing a control that supports the DockPattern control pattern has its `dockPosition` modified.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente, un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> que representa un control que admite el patrón de control DockPattern tiene su `dockPosition` modificado.

trans-unit.source: When a control is not able to execute the requested dock style.
trans-unit.target: Cuando un control no puede ejecutar el estilo de acoplamiento solicitado.
